name: Tiny Tap Quest
description:
Easy to play tapping RPG where you fight monsters and upgrade your character as much as you can!

Important Note: Save file is erased if you delete the game

4 different class types: Swordsman, Thief, Magician and Archer
Defeat bosses to unlock upgraded versions of each class type and new artifacts
Attack, defend and use skills to defeat harder and harder monsters
Challenge other players to PVP battles
Online high score
Watch ads for a helpful battle buff or more gold for upgrading
